title: Teaching sport skills to young athletes (TEFC)
creator_credit: Barton Cox, Jr Films and Barton Cox
brief_description: Gives coaches some guide lines for planning and conducting efficient practices and how to effectively teach specific sport skills. Stresses the importance of planning activities for the whole season ahead.
